name: Thaalian Wars V0.9
description:
The year is 3054, mankind has spread across the stars and prospered. Gathering resources and exploring more of the unknown!
While returning from a mining expedition a fault occurred within your mining vessels systems, you have slept 50 years past the intended arrival time... and drifted just as far. 
Awakening to the proximity alarms your crew have found themselves in the middle of an unknown civilisations space hub... and they aren't welcoming of your arrival! Scramble to your fighter and attempt  to see how many enemies you can eliminate before being defeated yourself!

This game is in development so please post any bugs and I will attempt to fix as quickly as possible.

Future updates will introduce an actual mission structure and story to go alongside the endless dogfight mode currently in the game!

Good luck pilot!

*This game is still under development and as such is not bug free. Please report any bugs found and they will be fixed as swiftly as possible.

Game resolution may load in 4:3 on some 16:9 monitors, cause is being looked into and doesn't seem to like 1440p*
